name: Cream of the crop (weirdybeardyman)
description:
The harvest needs to be in today, but your tractor has broken down. What can you do other than strap a scythe to the bottom of your crop duster and have at it?

Fly low to the ground to chop down the crops.

Be careful to watch your fuel, if you run out it's game over!

There are spare jerry cans in the barn, the doors are open so you can grab them without having to land.

Controls:

- WASD / Arrow keys

Tools-

Godot

Affinity Photo & Designer

Blender

Audacity

Credits-

Wheat texture painting approach taken from this great Godot snow tutorial -

I used this Godot plane contoller tutorial from KidsCanCode -

I tried to give a sense of speed based on this video -

Motion blur https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/211

Camera Shake https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/735

Things I missed-

You can't see your mouse when trying to press the buttons to play again.

I forgot to add controller support.

Sorry there isn't any music, I only had 30 mins left to add SFX and music.
